text: Grimstad is a municipality in Agder county, Norway. Archaeology: Norway's second largest find of artefacts from the Viking period, is the Slemmedal hoard (Slemmedalskatten); It was found in 1981, and it dates to the 930s.https://www.nrk.no/sorlandet/mystisk-vikingskatt-fram-i-lyset-1.17027660. title: Grimstad
